events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position. Thank you for your interest in joining our engineering team.
Your application has been reviewed and categorized under the Software Engineering department. We will proceed with the next steps shortly.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your case to guide you through the recruitment process for the engineering role.
The initial screening of your application and resume was successfully completed. Your background matches the requirements so far.
We received your response confirming your availability for the technical interview and appreciated your promptness.
Your technical interview for the Software Engineer position has been scheduled for 2024-04-20 at 10 AM UTC.
You successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong problem-solving skills and coding proficiency.
Your HR interview has been scheduled for the 25th of April at 2 PM UTC. We look forward to discussing your fit with the company culture.
You completed the HR interview, impressing the team with your communication skills and alignment with our values.
We have formally proposed you an offer for the Software Engineer role, including salary and benefits details sent via email.
We received your positive feedback and questions concerning the offer, which we are addressing promptly to facilitate your decision.
You have accepted the offer, and we are excited to welcome you to our engineering team. Next steps in onboarding will follow shortly.
Your onboarding process has commenced, including setup of development tools, access provisioning, and orientation sessions.
All recruitment activities are now complete, and you are officially hired as a Software Engineer at our company. Welcome aboard!
